articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Administration's Controversies: Immigration to Investment Scrutiny
articles.description: The Trump administration faces various controversies, including the deportation of foreign students, scrutiny of investment products linked to Trump Media, and new policies affecting media records. Additionally, there are tensions over livestock imports from Mexico and social security board funding, amid broader political disputes.
articles.content: In a series of escalating disputes, U.S. universities are advising foreign students on how to endure President Donald Trump's immigration policies. These measures have already led to the detainment and deportation of students involved in political pr... [629 chars]

articles.author: BreakingNews.ie
articles.title: Russia launches 150 drones at Ukraine as Trump doubts Putin’s desire for peace
articles.description: The US president has expressed new scepticism that a peace deal can be reached soon.
articles.content:
Russia launched a sweeping drone assault across Ukraine overnight into Sunday, targeting multiple regions, after US President Donald Trump cast doubt over Russian President Vladimir Putin’s willingness to end the war.

articles.author: BreakingNews.ie
articles.title: Greenland’s PM says island cannot be bought and US showing disrespect
articles.description: Jens-Frederik Nielsen made the remarks in defiance of US President Donald Trump’s interest in taking control of the strategic territory
articles.content:
New Greenlandic Prime Minister Jens-Frederik Nielsen said on Sunday that US statements about the mineral-rich Arctic island have been disrespectful and that Greenland “will never, ever be a piece of property that can be bought by just anyone”.
Mr Nie... [1953 chars]

articles.title: Trump's first 100 days: America First president is overturning world order
articles.description: Trump's first 100 days: America First president is overturning world order
articles.content:
He has launched an unprecedented global tariff war and slashed US foreign aid.

articles.title: Stripped-down White House correspondents dinner honours journalistic excellence
articles.description: President Donald Trump did not attend.
articles.content:
There was no president or comedian, but what remained at the White House Correspondents’ Association’s annual dinner were the journalists and the First Amendment.

articles.title: Ukrainians say they will not accept formal surrender of Crimea
articles.description: Donald Trump’s peace proposal would see the US formally recognise Crimea as Russian and de facto accepting Moscow’s rule over occupied territories.

articles.description: The HBO host thinks Trump voters realize they have 'plenty to lose' during the recent economic turmoil.

articles.author: 7NEWS.com.au
articles.title: Trump, Zelensky hold 'good' talks in Vatican basilica at Pope Francis’ funeral two months after White House argument
articles.description: The world leaders have used the funeral of Pope Francis to have a calmer chat than they did in the US two months ago.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump and Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelensky, in Rome for the funeral of Pope Francis, have met one-on-one in a marble-lined Vatican basilica to try to revive faltering efforts to end Russia’s war with Ukraine.
